event.title: 2010 census, including residents of Hanscom Air Force Base that live

data.event: The population was 6,362 at the 2010 census, including residents of Hanscom Air Force Base that live within town limits.
Lincoln was settled by Europeans in 1654, as a part of Concord.

event.title: incorporated as a separate town in 1754

data.event: It was split from Concord, and incorporated as a separate town in 1754.
